title: Survey Font from TMZ.com
content:
Hi,

I 've been attempting to ID  
the font type in the attachment  
below.

Your help would be greatly  
appreciated.

Thanks
author: tm6464

comments.content: Looks like (an artificially obliqued) [Source Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20140123050701/http:/www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Source+Sans+Pro) to me. If you use it, too, make sure to select the proper italic styles.

Hi R,

Thanks for your help.

SOLVED BY R
